title: enru tAn krpai
sahitya:
enru tAn krpai nI enakkup-purivAyO endan kali tIra sendUranE ini


anupallavi

  unran karuNai kOri inruvarai kaNDa phalan onrumillaiyE manam kunri vADuginrEn


caraNam    tirai kaDark-karaiyOram uraiviDam AnadAl kurai eDuttuk-kUrum kural kAdil kETkalaiyO
pirai shUDum viri shaDai perumAnum tirumAlum iru mAndiDa sirandOnE
